title: [Health] New study raises concerns: upon admission to the hospital for heart failure, 84% of patients ages 65 or older took five or more medications, and 42% took 10 or more. Upon discharge, 95% were prescribed five or more medications; and 55% were prescribed 10 or more.
[Medicine] NR Can Enhance T Cell Antitumor Immunity by Restoring Mitochondrial Function in Animal Models
